class.name: PathExtrudeProfileBase
class.brief_description: A base class for defining the cross-sectional profile to extrude in a [PathExtrude3D] node.
class.description: This serves as the base for other classes that return the extruded profile in [member get_cross_section]. You can extend this class with custom scripts that override [method _generate_cross_section] in order to customize your own profile.

method.name: _generate_cross_section
method.description: An overrideable, virtual method for defining custom cross-sectional profiles using your own custom code. [b]Note:[/b] You must use a [code]@tool[/code] script to see the mesh build in the editor.

method.name: get_cross_section
method.description: Returns an array of Vector2s defining the cross section profile to be extruded.

method.name: queue_update
method.description: Manually updates the cross section and alerts the [PathExtrude3D] to rebuild. This is called automatically, but you can call it manually if you need to.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the extruded profile will have its faces flipped, e.g. pipes become hollow tubes.
